about.title: About Me
details: I embrace change and innovation, never hesitating to refactor and rebuild when a better solution emerges.
With 5 years of IT operations and data analytics experience, I specialize in large-scale data processing and system optimization.
I leverage data-driven methodologies to identify problems and deliver measurable improvements, with a focus on continuous performance optimization.
